thread.title: Brazil Finance Minister Meirelles joins ruling party, eyes presidential run

title: Brazil Finance Minister Meirelles joins ruling party, eyes presidential run
text:
April 3, 2018 / 4:01 PM / in an hour Brazil Finance Minister Meirelles joins ruling party, eyes presidential run Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
BRASILIA, April 3 (Reuters) - Brazilian Finance Minister Henrique Meirelles joined the ruling Brazilian Democratic Movement party (MDB) on Tuesday with an eye to running for president or becoming President Michel Temerâ€™s running mate in the October election. 
Meirelles, 72, is expected to resign as minister by the end of the week, which under Brazilian election law is the deadline for leaving a government position before the campaign. Deputy Finance Minister Eduardo Guardia is expected to replace him. (Reporting by Anthony Boadle)
